Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the negotiability of disciplinary procedures affecting police officers
Summary: Relates to the negotiability of disciplinary procedures affecting police officers; provides that "terms and conditions of employment" shall include for all employees who are police officers under law, alternatives to any statutory or regulatory disciplinary provisions relating to the adjudication and disposition of disciplinary charges; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง201, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the negotiability of disciplinary procedures affecting police officers
